thread.title: W Taipei presents “FASHION ACTION” featuring DJ Scarlett Etienne
thread.title_full: W Taipei presents “FASHION ACTION” featuring DJ Scarlett Etienne

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: W Taipei presents “FASHION ACTION” featuring DJ Scarlett Etienne
text:
W Taipei presents “FASHION ACTION” featuring DJ Scarlett Etienne W Taipei presents “FASHION ACTION” featuring DJ Scarlett Etienne Details Category: Hotel   15:15 Seize your chance to party away the late summer with us at the “Fashion Action” Party, featuring DJ and fashion icon, Scarlett Etienne from 10pm till late on August 22 at the signature WOOBAR of W Taipei; undeniably the hippest and sleekest place in town. Admission per person is TWD800 including two welcome drinks. “Music is one of W’s passion points,” said W Taipei General Manager Cary M. Gray, “and that is exactly why W differentiates from others. It’s our pleasure to invite Scarlett Etienne to WOOBAR for the live gig this time and to bring her dynamic remix and beats into this happening Taipei City.” 
The fabulous DJ Scarlett Etienne, who is also known as performer, model, style icon and music producer, is Pioneer’s long-term sponsored DJ. She is skilled in funky, techy and seductive house music and has worked with ultra cool Parisian label Kitsuné and Lady Gaga's producer DJ White Shadow. Scarlett gigged in lots of international music festivals including Robot Heart party at Burning Man Festival, Nevada. It’s not all, she was also the music director and created soundtrack for Ziad Ghanem's Haute Couture collection at London Fashion Week 2010, sang vocals for Om Records and HighNote Records with Andy Caldwell, collaborated with fashion designer Mathew Williamson for fashion shows and even helped to develop the Pioneer CDJ 2000 professional multi player. W Taipei’s “The Liquid Lab” has gathered up the most inspirational ideas from our mixologists presenting two delicious and exclusive cocktails - “Hells Bubbles” and “Gentlemen’s Rules.” Matching perfectly with our party theme, these two special cocktails are based with Veuve clicquot and Jose curevo gold tequila, introducing marvelous tastes from two different recipes. “Hells Bubbles:” a luscious strawberry pink made with Agave nectar, Fresh lemon juice and Strawberry puree. “Gentlemen’s Rules:” a sweet light sky blue made with Cointreau, Blue curacao liqueur and Fresh lime juice. Indulge in these specially-curated cocktails and enjoy this wonderful night with us! Related articles
